Detailed Description

Packet that is send as reply to the TopRegionRequest-packet.

After the normal header this packet contains
PosSizeComment
REPLY_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes Number of top regions
For each country 4 bytes Top region type
4 bytes Top region id
16 bytes BoundingBox
4 bytes Number of strings
Nbr of strings * 4 bytes language_t
Nbr of strings * 4 bytes name_t
Nbr of strings * string String
After the topregs * idtree idtree

Definition at line 60 of file TopRegionPacket.h.
